scenario_text.value:
There’s nothing here.
Let’s check somewhere else.

Look, Takuma! I think this is one of those
plants we can eat!

Hey! Don’t just start eating it! We don’t
even know if it’s safe!

Are you okay? I can’t believe you just did
that!

That’s weird... I did the same thing Minoru
did. Why didn’t it work for me?

Look, you can’t go around shoving things in
your mouth when you don’t know what they are.

I don’t think we’ll find anything here. Let’s
check somewhere else.

There’s nothing here.
Let’s check somewhere else.
